item.title: Azuchi Castle Ruins
item.description: Azuchi Castle Ruins. This was the castle of famous feudal warlord Nobunaga Oda. There are only stone walls and stairs were left, but I guess it is what is called decadentism, the place has a nice atmosphere. From the tower ruin, you can overlook the townscape and the lakescape.
